Posts.Content: You may or may not. The first time I lost my hair due to chemotherapy I didn't lose my eyebrows or eyelashes but when my hair started growing back when I wasn't getting chemo, and I started again I lost my eyebrows were completely thinned out and I lost all of my eyelashes. Hope this helps and good luck with your treatment.
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back
